name: Watch
description: ChunkWatchEvent.Watch is fired when an EntityPlayer begins watching a chunk. This event is fired when a chunk is added to the watched chunks of an EntityPlayer in ChunkManager.setChunkLoadedAtClient(net.minecraft.entity.player.ServerPlayerEntity, net.minecraft.util.math.ChunkPos, net.minecraft.network.IPacket<?>[], boolean, boolean) . This event is not Cancelable . This event does not have a result. HasResult This event is fired on the MinecraftForge#EVENT_BUS .
